tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN,
  regulatory_standards TEXT,
  creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RiskAssessmentReports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  report_type VARCHAR,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceStandards (
  standard_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_name VARCHAR,
  description TEXT,
  compliance_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE FintechCompanies (
  company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR,
  establishment_date DATE,
  industry_sector VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceOfficers (
  officer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  officer_name VARCHAR,
  contact_email VARCHAR,
  company_id UUID REFERENCES FintechCompanies(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ReportComments (
  comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id UUID REFERENCES RiskAssessmentReports(report_id),
  comment_text TEXT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR
)
